transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Executive: Yes sir. 
Customer: Ji main Ashutosh baat kar raha hun.

Hello aap office ha boliye.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Haan abhi mere account mein nahi hai.
Executive: Haan Asan communication se. Ji ji last time hamari baat hui thi na ji.
Customer: Uske baad uska kya hua wo mera abhi tak show nahi kar raha hai us pe.
Executive: Kya show nahi kar raha?
Customer: Jaise agar hum license free walkie talkie wagera ye sab ye search karte hain na India mart pe to wo aata nahi hai kuch bhi mera mera profile show nahi kar raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai uske liye jo maine bataya tha na wo chije abhi aap follow kar rahe hain nahi jo tha call ka wo gaya.
Customer: Haan maine uske baad aapko message kar raha hun lekin fir bhi.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan bataiye pura bataiye.
Customer: Haan main kar raha hun sab chije follow kar raha hun lekin abhi mere ko response matlab show nahi kar raha hai abhi bhi.
Executive: Haan shayad ye hota hai jaise one week ka time hota hai one week mein debust ho jati hai chije.
Executive: Aapka main category thi na ek bar main ek bar check kar leta hun last time ka aapka consumption ek bar.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye line pe rahiye.

Hello
Customer: Hello ha main check kar raha hun.
Executive: Theek hai main mapping dekh raha tha mapping mein to gadbad nahi hai product to correct hi added hai mapping mein last jo humne discussion kiya tha na uske baad se kuch change nahi aaya to wo perfect hai ek bar main consumption ka dekh leta hun lead consumption ka.
Customer: Hmm theek hai.
Executive: Line pe rahiye.
Customer: Aaj aapne waise koi lead purchase nahi ki na aaj.
Customer: Aaj lead aayi nahi hai mere khayal se ye bataiyega iska mujhe thoda feedback dijiyega jo last mein aayi thi na ground plane antenna.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan ye kaisi lead thi sahi thi.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi theek nahi thi ye.
Executive: Theek hai iska iske through aayi thi.
Executive: Ye to main consumption dekh pa raha hun wo nahi dikhega mujhe ye jo aapne consume kari thi buyer ka name bata deta hun chaliye yaad aa jaye Payal ji naam tha inka Payal.
Customer: Payal.
Executive: Haan nahi nahi theek nahi thi galat.
Customer: Galat.
Executive: Kuch thoda mujhe bata sakte hain taki main isko side mein ek bar likh ke bata dun.
Customer: Inhone product hi ha sir inhone product hi galat chuna tha.
Executive: Achcha ha.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai ek chij aur bataiyega last time jo consume hui thi three pieces walkie talkie Santosh Kumar Pune se ye bhi relevant nahi.
Customer: Main bata deta hun Santosh Kumar naam tha inka four pieces walkie talkie Pune se the lead.
Executive: Ye kam ki lead.
Customer: Maine call kiya tha lekin pick nahi pick nahi hua.
Executive: Achcha inhone pick nahi kiya.
Executive: Theek hai aur main ek bar dekh leta hun aaj lead ka.
Executive: Abhi mujhe bata dete hain jaise last jo hamari baat hui thi na.
Customer: Kya keh rahe ho aap?
Executive: Haan mujhe ek rough idea bata sakte hain last jo hamari baat hui thi na to uske baad se to aapne jaise maine bataya tha na lead manager pe to aap definitely active ho gaye the calls ka bhi wo maine usi din fix kara diya tha maine message bhi kiya tha to calls ka bhi theek hai aur leads ka to lead consume kar rahe the to us din ke baad se mujhe thoda agar rough idea puchu agar 10 lead agar aap consume karte hain 10 lead aa jati hai unme se kitne kam ki nikal rahi hai abhi ek do teen char aise koi rough idea.
Customer: Mushkil se ek.
Customer: Mushkil se ek.
Executive: Hmm theek hai main aur chije check karta hun ye bataiye last jab hamari baat hui thi uske baad se koi buyer ki call aayi hai abhi.
Customer: Buyer ki nahi abhi nahi hai nahi abhi nahi aayi.
Executive: Theek hai wo bhi chalu ho jayegi.
Customer: Sir dusra isme jo hai na ye lead mere pass na galat aa rahi hai bahut jyada.
Customer: Mujhe bata sakte hain ki ek bar kon se lead aapko galat aa rahi hai uska naam bata sakte hain isme se isme se aap isme se aap ye batao ki category hataenge kaise ki mere pass us category ki nahi aayegi mere pass.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main bata deta hun jaise aap lead dekhte hain na jab bhi koi lead aati hai usme ek side mein na delete ka button dekhte hain aap not relevant ke naam se delete ka button rehta hai.
Customer: Haan not relevant to kara tha maine lekin fir bhi aa rahi hai mere pass.
Executive: Not main bata deta hun isme kya karna jo man lijiye jo aapka not relevant hai na daily basis pe na char panch ko na not relevant mein I don't deal in this category mark kar dena theek hai.
Customer: Aisa koi option aisa koi option nahi hai ki permanent hat jaye wo.
Executive: Mujhe category ka ek bar naam bata sakte hain.
Customer: Ek to product ka naam category jaise battery cables.
Executive: Battery cables ha.
Executive: Theek hai ek minute rukiye main dekh leta hun.
Executive: Okay isme kya hai na battery cables ke product added hai DC battery cables ha edit hoga lekin main matlab actually kya hota hai ki jo battery cables hai na wo normal battery cables nahi hoti jo logo ko chaiye hoti meri army wali hoti hai wo wo fark hota hai us chij mein.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai to aap suno suno aap kuch aisa kar do ki isme jo by leads aaye na jo main category select karu usi se by lead aaye bas.
Executive: Hmm ek bar dobara repeat kare jo by leads aaye aapke pass.
Customer: Jaise jo main category select karu na theek hai sirf wahi by leads aaye bas.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai uska main bata deta hun main na do chije bata deta hun kyuki ye to waise hi rahega algorithm rehta hai to main do chije batata hun ek kam karo pehla to jo battery cables ki aa rahi hai na jaise DC ke alava DC cable wo alag product ho jata hai uske alava deal nahi kar sakte to jo bhi aa jata hai na usko delete karke not relevant mark kar dena pehla to ye karna sir wo to maine kar dunga lekin main ye chah raha hun ki wo aaye hi na isme thodi bahut rehti hai actually nahi aayegi fir kya hoga dusra kya karna ek chij aur karna jo battery cable hai na setting rehta hai na setting aapne dekha hoga na setting kya rehta hai desktop mein ek portal hoga setting ha setting ha setting mein gaya ha ha preference pe jaiye ha to aao na mapping kar deta hun ha bilkul niche aa jaiye category category preference aa raha hoga ek minute main settings mein gaya uske baad aapka by preference nahi category settings me jaane ke baad ek minute category preference pe aa gaye aap category preference nahi hai by preference likha hua hai isme main dobara repeat kar raha hun dekhiye starting se bata settings pe aap gaye settings ke baad by preference pe gaye by preference pe gaye ha by preference pe gaye uske baad ha uske baad bilkul end mein hoga category preference dikh gaya sir ha ha mujhe ek chij batana waha search karke ek bar main bhi apne portal open kar raha hun waha par ek bar search dekhna ki aapki preferred category usme koi aa raha hai ki you also deal in this karke beech mein aisa koi aa raha hai aap ek bar ek bar any desk karoge aap kya karoge any desk any desk any desk hmm theek hai ek minute rukiye theek hai ek kam karna sir isko aap boliye jab jab aap preferred category dekh rahe ho na side mein dikh raha hai non preferred category sir main keh raha hun any desk any desk pe aap le sakte ho abhi any desk ek product matlab kya keh rahe ho we value your call your continued patience is greatly appreciated please stay on the line
summary:
Concerns:

- Profile not showing on IndiaMART.

- Leads are irrelevant and incorrect.

- Wants to stop receiving irrelevant leads.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the mapping, no issues found.

- Suggested marking irrelevant leads as 'not relevant'.

- Executive provided steps to set category preferences.



Next Steps: 

- Executive offered assistance via AnyDesk.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, category, profile, preferences, anydesk
